title: Can Labour’s poll lead transfer to Scottish success at the ballot box?

title: All the candidates standing in the Rochdale by-election this month
description: The date for the Rochdale by-election is Thursday, February 29 - which means candidates have just under four weeks to try and win the support of voters. Here is the full list of candidates and the political parties they are representing:

description: Radical instincts have been set aside as Sir Keir Starmer and co carry the Ming vase, inscribed with "economic credibility" across the polished floor, terrified of any slip-up. But Ms Rayner, once the left firebrand now tamed by the taste of power ...

title: Everyone who is standing in the Rochdale by-election
description: On 29 February, residents of the Rochdale constituency will have their chance to say who they want to represent them

title: Business bosses fear ‘sting in the tail’ on taxes from Labour, says insider
description: In front of bosses from companies including Microsoft and Aviva, shadow Chancellor Rachel Reeves pledged that Labour would freeze corporation tax for five years if it wins the next election.

title: The Guardian view on Labour’s £28bn green deal: don’t prove Tories right by ditching it
description: Editorial: Sir Keir Starmer wants to change his country for the better. That won’t happen if he drops his key industrial strategy for growth

title: Former Labour mayor launches independent election campaign with scathing attack on party
description: AN ELECTED Labour mayor who was barred by the party from standing in May’s mayoral election has launched his election campaign standing as an independent.

title: Labour not committed to ‘arbitrary’ numbers on green investment – Rayner
description: Labour deputy leader Angela Rayner has said the party is not committed to “arbitrary” numbers on its pledge to ultimately invest £28 billion a year in the green economy. She said the money will depend on sticking to fiscal rules and Labour will “ramp up” to this figure if in government.

title: Labour’s core supporters have been betrayed. And it will haunt Keir Starmer
description: You can see why Labour has decided to keep things as they are in this regard. The party is desperately keen to be seen as supportive of business and financial services, and they do not want to shake up or alienate those sectors in an election year, at an extremely difficult economic juncture.

title: Transcript: Who still votes Conservative?
description: I mean, just look at how Keir Starmer, for the first two years of this parliament was doing incredibly badly in by-elections and local elections, and is now doing stunningly well in by-elections and local elections. Broadly speaking, what is the shift?

title: Elton John and Keir Starmer attend Derek Draper's funeral
description: Famous faces including Elton John and Sir Keir Starmer were spotted arriving at the funeral of Kate Garraway's husband Derek Draper. Derek's funeral took place in north-west London, four weeks after he died aged 56 following a near four-year Covid battle.

title: Labour commences access talks with civil service

title: Derek Draper funeral: Kate Garraway's final goodbye as Elton John performs and daughter carries coffin

description: Angela Rayner has cast further doubt on Labour’s plan to invest up to £28billion a year in the green economy if it wins power, calling the

title: Derek Draper: Elton John and Tony Blair attend funeral service
description: Sir Elton John and Sir Tony Blair are among the stars and politicians attending the funeral of Derek Draper, the author and former political adviser who died last month. Draper's wife, TV presenter Kate Garraway, and their children were also in attendance at the private service.

title: Derek Draper's funeral is attended by figures like Sir Elton John, Sir Keir Starmer and Sir Tony Blair
description: Former prime minister Sir Tony Blair, musician Sir Elton John and Labour Leader Sir Keir Starmer were among the high-profile figures attending the funeral of TV presenter Kate Garraway’s Chorley born husband, Derek Draper.

title: Derek Draper funeral: Kate Garraway and children say final goodbye
description: Garraway's Good Morning Britain co-stars Susanna Reid and Ben Shephard were among the first to arrive for the service at St Mary the Virgin church in Primrose Hill, north west London. Sir Elton John, 76, was seen arriving with filmmaker husband David Furnish, 61.

title: Derek Draper's funeral's heartbreaking moments – Elton John song to Kate Garraway's sweet gesture
description: Sir Elton John, Tony Blair, Keir Starmer, Piers Morgan and Mylene Klass were among the guests in attendance, who all sang Lord of the Dance during the service. Sir Elton, who became a "huge friend" to Kate amid Derek's health struggle, sang his hit Skyline ...

title: Jonathan Pie: Heroes And Villains
description: It’s fair to say he fails. While this stand-up show is officially called Heroes ​and Villains, a more accurate title would be All Tories Are Cunts. It’s a vicious 70-minute invective against the charlatans of the ruling party, as angrily passionate a diatribe as fans of Tom Walker’s permanently furious alter-ego have come to expect.

title: Inside Derek Draper's funeral: Friends reveal Kate Garraway 'wore her husband's watch to keep a little piece of him with her' and Elton John moved congregation to tears with ...
description: The Good Morning Britain host wore her husband's watch 'so that she could carry a little piece of him on the day' at the Church of St Mary the Virgin in Primrose Hill, where the couple married.

title: Elton John and Tony Blair among mourners at Derek Draper’s funeral
description: The husband of TV presenter Kate Garraway died on January 3 aged 56 after suffering long-lasting symptoms from coronavirus.
